message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.DL. 

The paper discusses a novel class of Approximate Policy Iteration (API) algorithms that maintain and optimize two policies, a fast reactive policy and a slow non-reactive policy. This work falls under the broad category of reinforcement learning (RL) and machine learning (ML), which are covered by several sub-categories in arXiv CS. Specifically, cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.DL (Deep Learning) are likely categories as they cover topics related to RL and ML. Additionally, cs.RO (Robotics) and cs.SY (Systems and Control) are also possible categories as the paper discusses the efficacy of the approach on various continuous control Markov Decision Processes, which are commonly studied in robotics and control theory.
